descriptionItems.title: Whitelist Sale
descriptionItems.text: Whitelist members will have access to mint the first 3.000 NFTs and receive a one time coupon for discount on ETB Courses! 🎫

descriptionItems.title: Award ETB Hackaton Teams
descriptionItems.text: We won the hackaton 🎉, but we feel like other participants should have their efforts rewarded! So we are giving away 20 NFTs to the other teams. 🥳

descriptionItems.title: Art Contest
descriptionItems.text: Developer Art Contest with NFT Rewards to the most voted art. 🎨

descriptionItems.title: Raffles
descriptionItems.text: Share our content and invite your friends to our community to receive raffle tickets and have a chance to win NFT prizes! 🎟️🎁

descriptionItems.title: Open Public Sale
descriptionItems.text: Minting will be available for everyone! 😉

descriptionItems.title: ETB Courses Discount
descriptionItems.text: KryptoDevelopers NFT holders are eligible to get ETB courses discounts. 📚🔝

descriptionItems.title: Future Access to Community Resources
descriptionItems.text: As the community grows, KryptoDevelopers NFT holders will get access to exclusive community resources, like merch, courses and more! 🌟
